org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.tracker.statetracker.hazelcast

Class BaseHazelCastStateTracker<E extends Updateable<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.tracker.statetracker.hazelcast.BaseHazelCastStateTracker<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, StateTracker<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeepAutoEncoderHazelCastStateTracker, HazelCastStateTracker

    public abstract class BaseHazelCastStateTracker<E extends Updateable<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateTracker<E>
    Baseline hazelcast state tracker
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
